title: MagicSpell4 SoundEffect
description: This is a MagicSpell sound effects package designed to create sounds for magical spells, enchantments, skills, and item usage.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/_kxFLyrf0Sk


This is a MagicSpell sound effects package designed to create sounds for magical spells, enchantments, skills, and item usage.

  • 274 Audio, 274 Cue
  • Mono, Stereo


File.

  • Angelic 84
  • Electricity 17
  • Fire 13
  • Frostbite 6
  • Ice 76
  • LightingGliter 15
  • LongBurn 4
  • Water 17
  • Whoosh 37
  • Wind 6

technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 274 (Mono 274, Stereo 274)
  • Number of Audio Cue: 274 (Mono 274, Stereo 274)

  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
